definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
to feel/to sense/to detect/to perceive/to become aware
to become aware/to detect/to realize/to perceive
to sense/to perceive/to become aware of/to detect

sentences.english: We ate half a jin of roast chestnuts, had a nap and soon arrived in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 一路上吃了半斤炒栗子，睡了一會兒覺，就到了北京。

sentences.english: On that night could not the king sleep, and he commanded to bring the book of records of the chronicles; and they were read before the king.
sentences.chinese: 那夜王睡不着覺，就吩咐人取歷史來，念給他聽。

sentences.english: I often wake up with a new idea.
sentences.chinese: 一覺醒來就會想到一個新點子。

sentences.english: Men tend to notice these lines on the forehead since they usually sleep with the face pressed face down on the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 那些喜歡趴着睡覺的男士，則會發現前額出現皺紋。

sentences.english: With the weather hot, most of the people can't sleep at night.
sentences.chinese: 由於天氣太熱，許多人晚上睡不着覺。

sentences.english: Deepwater Horizon's failure demoralized the whole nation.
sentences.chinese: 而“深水地平線”的失敗則使整個美國都覺面上無光。

sentences.english: Remember sleeping earlier oh, slept at 10 o'clock but hairdressing becomes aware.
sentences.chinese: 記得早點睡喲，10點睡的可是美容覺。

sentences.english: There was an audible stillness. in which the common voice sounded strange.
sentences.chinese: 四周一片聽的見的寂靜，連平常的聲音聽來也覺異樣。

sentences.english: The princess felt sad and did not like to sleep. Then she became tabid.
sentences.chinese: 公主很痛苦，她睡不着覺，人也變得憔悴。

sentences.english: It was not until their mother came back that the children went to bed.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們一直到母親回來纔去睡的覺。

sentences.english: Me, too. It gives out a nice warm and comfortable feeling.
sentences.chinese: 我也是，木質質料給人一種以及煦恬靜的覺患上。

sentences.english: Surprise, consciousness, and pleasure appeared in each of the three on this unexpected meeting;
sentences.chinese: 這次不期而遇使得三人個個又驚又喜，又覺尷尬。

sentences.english: I stand up, fluff the hair, mood because of enough sleep .
sentences.chinese: 我站起來，抖抖毛，因爲睡足了覺而心情舒暢。

sentences.english: I am tired. Do you have any good ways for good sleeping?
sentences.chinese: 我累死了，你有任何可以讓人睡好覺的方法嗎？
現在是，連這“一覺”也沒有了。

definition: to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
